name: Create Natural Disasters
description:
In this game you build stuff and destroy it with natural disasters for points. 

Controls:

K to restart, Q to make a meteor, E to start/stop an earthquake, scroll to zoom in or out, R to make wind blowing left and T to make wind blowing right.

 press 1 then click to make a cube,  press 2 then click to make a long cube,  press 3 then click to make a person, press 4 then click to make a ragdoll, press 5 then click to make a destructible building, press 6 then click to make snow.
